From the brightening side of the moon a large wave of something rose 
from =
its surface. Red like the landscape it flew from, it rose into 
the air. Th=
en with a smooth twist of hue it turned black as the 
shadows of space enve=
loped it. Like some black fog hunter-
terminators, or sweeps as some call t=
hem, along with their leader 
Scourge, gathered themselves under the direct=
ion of the mighty 
Cyclonus. Then with lightening swiftness boosters flared=
 turning the 
surface of the moon crimson for the briefest of moments befor=
e they 
struck out across open space, moving with precision and ease toward=
 
the unsuspecting inhabitants of the earth. 



Inside the pacifist Maxima=
l base in Atlantis the computers continued 
to monitor the grounds, primari=
ly attempting to keep track of the 
fleeing Trelos. But as always a few con=
es were pointed skyward, 
always on the look out for Minions. What they saw=
 today the computers 
had no way to understand. Something that was there an=
d yet not there. 
The slightest bit of distortion, that under normal circum=
stances 
would have been ignored, but in this case was large, and worse yet=
, 
it was moving. (OOC: Think of Predator's invisibility when he moved) 

A=
 yellow warning light began to go off in the pacifist command 
center, as t=
he computer screen automatically projected course and 
heading. Approximate=
d heading: Atlantis. Unfortunately no one was 
there to notice.

 

On the =
grounds of Atlantis the pursuit of Trelos continues as several 
Maximals at=
tempt to retrieve the rather elusive Predacon from his 
newest hiding spot,=
 underwater. One boat is on the water obviously 
searching, while a floatin=
g car hovers over the waters doing its own 
search. Meanwhile Rodimus has n=
oted a rather odd dot in the skies, 
one that he can see to be a Predacon e=
agle. He is pointing at it. And 
even as he is doing this he notes somethin=
g strange coming from 
behind the eagle. The sky for a moment seems to flas=
h and ripple, 
almost like lightning, and yet there is a slight rotation to=
 the 
flashes. 



In the skies above the eagle looks down noting Rodimus p=
ointing at 
him, and he begins to drop out of the skies moving out over ope=
n 
water, preparing either to flee, or do a strafing run. In either case 
h=
e is totally unaware of what is transpiring over his head.



On the ground=
s below Rodimus can see what is coming as his enhanced 
vision sees two ver=
y tiny dots spiraling out from the rippling 
flashes. At the same time Klax=
ons begin to go off as base computers 
do actually recognize this threat: M=
ISSILES!



Erupting out of the skies, twin missiles streak across the skie=
s, 
vortexes of flames spiraling after them like crimson, cone shaped 
cont=
rails. They slam into communication towers, and the towers as 
well as a fe=
w outlying buildings burst into flames. 

In the background, almost unnotic=
ed, a Myrmidon spirals out of the 
skies, the recipient of several laser bl=
asts. Small gouts of flames 
flowing from him even as he impacts the water.=
 Myrmidon sinks beneath 
the waves.

And flying from amidst this bombardmen=
t Cyclonus rises high into the 
air.

"The days you have known are over. Al=
l that you have belongs to us! 
Resist and be destroyed!! THE MINIONS OF UN=
ICRON HAVE COME!"

Even Cyclonus spoke sweeps arrive seeming to almost dark=
en the skies 
for a momsnt, disintegrator blasts providing bright flashes o=
f light 
as they bath Atlantis and the Maximal base in war.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

OOC: I am sure other Maximal and Preda=
con bases/HQ's will note 
something similar to what the Maximal base in Atl=
antis noted, feel 
free for anyone to jump in, if it makes sense. 

The onl=
y thing of note is that the Sweeps and Scourge cannot be 
locked on to with=
 sensors (check out their profiles on wiki). That 
should not affect most o=
f you very much, since most of you shoot by 
sight anyways, unless you are =
using base sensors or some remote 
sensing capability. 

Also any Minions t=
hat chose to come with are in this group as well.
